scripts.export:mov: ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames/frame_%04d.png -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 output.mov -y && rm -rf frames/*
scripts.export:mov2: node generate-audio.js && ffmpeg -framerate 20 -i frames/frame_%04d.png -i audio/combined_audio.mp3 -c:v prores_ks -pix_fmt yuva444p10le -profile:v 4 -c:a aac -shortest output2.mov -y && rm -rf frames/* && rm -rf audio/*
